steps.title: Aim your cursor at the crosshair.
steps.content: Aim your cursor at the crosshair. Follow Dvalin as he flies through the skies. Hold the mouse button or press the fire button to fire. This will fire shots at the crosshair. If you are not hitting the crosshair, then adjust your aim.

steps.title: Dodge the purple orbs.
steps.content: Dodge the purple orbs. At some point, Dvalin is going to fly too far out of reach. The purple orbs will deal damage when you hit them.

steps.title: Fire at the Anemo orbs.
steps.content: Fire at the Anemo orbs. When large green Anemo orbs appear on screen, aim your cursor and fire at them. This will break the Anemo orbs down into green rings.

steps.title: Use WASD or the joystick to fly through the green rings.
steps.content: Use WASD or the joystick to fly through the green rings. These green rings are pure Anemo energy; hitting them will cause you to fly faster and closer to Dvalin.

steps.title: Repeat to complete the first part of the battle.
steps.content: Repeat to complete the first part of the battle. After completing this part of the battle, you will be teleported to the battle arena to complete the second part.

steps.title: Use an archer to attack Dvalin while he is idle.
steps.content: Use an archer to attack Dvalin while he is idle. If battling for the first time, you will get to try Venti. Otherwise, you will need to use Amber or Fischl.

steps.title: Stay away from Dvalin when he swoops down.
steps.content: Stay away from Dvalin when he swoops down. When this happens, Dvalin's claws could deal damage to your character. Be sure to move towards the edge of the platform to avoid taking damage.

steps.title: Stay away from Dvalin's breath.
steps.content: Stay away from Dvalin's breath. In another of his moves, Dvalin will land on the platform you are on and blow at you. Move towards the other side of the platform to dodge this attack, and deal damage to Dvalin's talons to break down his shield.

steps.title: Avoid Dvalin's bite.
steps.content: Avoid Dvalin's bite. To do so, dash when you see his mouth moving towards you after he perches on the platform. You can attack his talons to break down his shield here as well.

steps.title: Keep from the pulse bombs.
steps.content: Keep from the pulse bombs. In this move, Dvalin will fire while flying. To do so, move from one end of the platform to another.

steps.title: Avoid the omega bomb.
steps.content: Avoid the omega bomb. In this move, Dvalin will suck up as much energy and blast it at the platform you are currently on. This attack deals a lot of damage to the character and the platform you are on.

steps.title: Cycle between platforms.
steps.content: Cycle between platforms. Every 2-8 minutes, Dvalin will launch "Caelestinum Finale Termini", an attack that damages and heats up the platform you are currently standing on. If this happens, you cannot stand on the platform you are currently on. You will have to rotate to another platform to continue fighting without taking damage over time. The amount of damage dealt is not significant, but it can add up over time. If you are too slow, all the platforms will be affected by this effect.

steps.title: Attack Dvalin's clot when you break his shield.
steps.content: Attack Dvalin's clot when you break his shield. Use your archer to launch charged attacks and aim at Dvalin's clot when he falls onto the platform. While you can climb onto Dvalin to do this, it is too slow and does not deal enough damage quickly enough.

steps.title: Repeat to defeat Dvalin.
steps.content: Repeat to defeat Dvalin. The first time you play, a cutscene will play. Subsequent times a Ley Line blossom will spawn on the platform you are on, and you can use it to collect rewards.

steps.title: Locate the Trounce Blossom.
steps.content: Locate the Trounce Blossom. This looks a bit like a wilted flower and is in the center of the current platform you are on.

steps.title: Use the Resin to revitalize the blossom.
steps.content: Use the Resin to revitalize the blossom. If you do not have enough Original Resin, you can use Fragile Resin instead.

steps.title: Collect rewards.
steps.content: Collect rewards. Depending on your level, you may get different rewards, but you will always get 200 EXP.

steps.title: Leave the domain.
steps.content: Leave the domain. After completing the Trounce domain, you can exit by locating the blue gate with four squares on it.
